--- title: "Citation Test" bibliography: references.bib --- # Test 1: Direct Citation in QMD This works normally: The CDC published guidelines in 1988 [@CDC1988]. # Test 2: Citations from CSV via cat(glue()) ## acceptability The concept was introduced by CDC in 1988 [@CDC1988] and later refined [@Calba2015]. ## timeliness Early frameworks focused on speed [@WHO2006], while modern approaches emphasize actionability [@ECDC2014]. # Test 3: Citations from CSV via markdown_html() ## acceptability (via markdown_html)

The concept was introduced by CDC in 1988 [@CDC1988] and later refined [@Calba2015].

## timeliness (via markdown_html)

Early frameworks focused on speed [@WHO2006], while modern approaches emphasize actionability [@ECDC2014].
